website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those who crave a little extra crunch with their snack.
pros: Bars are made from natural ingredients and include 4g of protein
We found the crunch bars to be more flavorful than their softer counterparts
Bars are crunchy, without being rock hard
Each crunch bar has less than 200 calories – an excellent and safe snack
cons: Flavor options are limited for the crunch bar

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: I got these with two things in mind. My 12 year old hates eating breakfast and wants to come home after school and eat junk food. I figured these might kill those two birds with one stone. He loves them. I don't have to feel like I'm sending my kid to school and he's starving until lunch, and they satisfy his sweet tooth and keep him from asking when's dinner every five minutes. And I don't feel like I'm feeding him garbage. Win for him and win for Mom.
customer_reviews.author: K2G2

customer_reviews.title: Yucky plastic aftertaste; don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of these being a fan of the classic Clif bars. These are not like the classic ones at all. They’re crunchy, which is fine, but they have an awful aftertaste. I can’t quite place it but almost like a weird plastic taste. Disgusting. I ended up throwing out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It made me not want to eat the others either because it looked bad and was suspiciously open
customer_reviews.text: My Clif bars arrived today. A box of 5. Unfortunately 1 bar was completely open. It made me not want to eat the others either, because it looked bad and was suspiciously open. Did not like them at all especially when I wasn’t allowed to return the faulty purchase
customer_reviews.author: veetee

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor! Easy to eat
customer_reviews.text: I really like CLIF in general. This bar is similar to a cheaper brand that sells this, but the flavor is poor in comparison. The prices were very close between the 2 brands but I really enjoyed the peanut butter flavor of this much more. This was worth the xtra few cents.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favs
customer_reviews.text: I love these peanut butter ones! The taste is really fantastic and is a nice treat, especially with a glass of milk. I agree with the other reviewers, though, these are certainly messy. I haven't met a "crunchy granola" bar that isn't messy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Geist

customer_reviews.title: Both kind of suck. The taste is alright
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for value. Nature's valley makes the same effin thing, but without the premium. And they even package them the same, 2 bars per wrapper. Both kind of suck. The taste is alright, but it's not a pleasant treat to eat, and you will end up with half of it all over your clothes. Plus if you are like me and want your snacks 100 calories at a time, having 2 bars in a wrapper just seems so lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Nox Arcana

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Wish I could get them at grocery but no one carries them now. I order 3 boxes at a time as an add-on. They taste great and are very crunchy! My favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rich, Delicious Snack Bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars come two in a package (and two to a serving size!) and are absolutely delicious. They are crunchy and rich. The peanut butter bars taste like they are made with actual peanut butter holding the grains together. The white chocolate macadamia nut bars have little pieces of soy white chocolate in the bars and you can taste them when you bite in. These bars can keep me full for a while and are a great snack. Appropriate for a plant based diet.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best Cliff bars hands down but shipping a bit long...
customer_reviews.text: We love these bars so much but couldn't fing them in our local stores (only the chocolate/peanut butter bars & they were so messy)! These are great for grabbing on the go, they're organic, and they have some protein... The shipping took a little long, but I am also spoiled as a Prime member with normal 2 day shipping. The items were packed appropriately & the boxes within we're in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Yanta

customer_reviews.title: A good snack, but messy
customer_reviews.text: CLIF makes CLIF bars, so I don't know why anyone would choose these instead. They are dry, and even if that doesn't bother you from a taste and texture perspective, it means they fall apart easily and aren't appropriate snacks anyplace where you don't want to leave a trail of crumbs. They're only for the outdoors. A big plus: they don't contain animal products.
customer_reviews.author: Just ask me!

customer_reviews.title: These were pretty solid. I wasn't expecting them to be similar ...
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty solid. I wasn't expecting them to be similar to a NatureValley bar, but it was pretty pleasant. There's a smear of peanut butter on the bar as well, which kinda makes it more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Scot G Russian

customer_reviews.title: Addictive Contents
customer_reviews.text: Addictive content. I do not ever wish to buy these again. It was like a drug.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinon, Mr.Xray2.0

customer_reviews.title: These are my all-time favorite granola bars
customer_reviews.text: These are my all-time favorite granola bars! I am a huge fan of peanut butter products and I've tried many different peanut butter granola bars. There is just something about these Cliff bars. They have a very pleasant texture and are sweet, but not overly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Yum, one of my favorite snacks to grab on the go
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Clampitt

customer_reviews.title: Good health bar
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I keep a a few packs in my bag when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Crunch & Munch
customer_reviews.text: These taste good and make a great snack. The amazon "add-on" price is unbeatable. I just wish they had a little more protein.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weitkamp

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, keeps me full
customer_reviews.text: I like these. Seems to keep me full when I can't stop to eat. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. They taste great and are crunchy like granola bars
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: We love this. Wish they would sell at my Walmart ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Wish they would sell at my Walmart but they don't so I order from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: E.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bars!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a wide variety of granola bars and I have to say, these are some really great tasting bars. If you like peanut butter, you will love these. Each box comes with 5 packages of 2 bars a piece. These are a great snack for the middle of the day. I'm looking forward to trying out the other flavors. If you get it with S&S, the price is very low as well. Overall, this is a great granola bar at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: We love these granola bars - they are crunchy with a nice flakey texture. They fill you up when you are in a hurry. Our daughter loves them, too. We order a few boxes every month! I love them! This flavor in particular is great, not too sweet. They do break if you carry them around outside of a box, be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bleish

customer_reviews.title: Shut The Front Door!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought 12 more to get free ship, just over 35 bucks for 12. Man these are just perfect crunchy peanut butter flavor. Blew me away. To be honest you probably should not buy these, because you'll be fuggin hooked.
customer_reviews.author: hippy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than the big name brand without the hard crunch. As others have pointed out, they do fall apart and can be messy. Careful if driving to work. Granola is by nature a loose item. Wish more grocery stores carried them, but glad Amazon ships fast!
customer_reviews.author: n2padres

customer_reviews.title: which is exactly where i like it. if it was crunchier it would disintegrate ...
customer_reviews.text: bar is in-between crunchy and chewy, which is exactly where i like it. if it was crunchier it would disintegrate like the nutirgrain bars, and if it were chewier it would not be pleasant to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Funk

customer_reviews.title: Love the peanut butter flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I was so upset when the local grocery stores stopped stocking the peanut butter flavor. I wake up craving these for breakfast every morning. They taste amazing & aren't as dry as some of the other favors. I was beyond happy to be able to order these as an add-on item for a great price. Much cheaper than driving 50 miles to Whole Foods to pay $5/box, and they're delivered right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: nataliem84

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Especially for peanut butter fans.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a healthy, affordable granola bar for our kids for years! These are our new favorite. They come two per package, so you really get ten per box. There is a layer of creamy peanut butter on top of each granola bar, so they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Sister of Moses

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious but they have way too much sugar. Counter productive for appetite control as sugar stimulates you to want more. I would devour these regularly if the sugar was cut way back
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: I love these maybe too much
customer_reviews.text: I love these maybe too much! The crunch variety is way better than the chewy/classic Clif bars. Love the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I love the peanut butter flavor and can't find it anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the peanut butter flavor and can't find it anywhere I live. Bit expensive here, but worth it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Rice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for early morning breakfasts on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Swiedals

customer_reviews.title: Love these, minus the crumbling that happens every time ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these, minus the crumbling that happens every time you open one! I eat these as a protein source after the gastric bypass, I continue buying these because of the taste and fiber content.
customer_reviews.author: pretzelp

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste great and are healthy. Another awesome product from Clif. Would definitely buy again- just be aware that the bars are two to a pack, not 10 packs of granola bars. Similar in size to Nature Valley granola bars, but way better.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and value
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and all natural. I had these a while back and this price was a great deal. They are fresh and great for snacks or meals. I would think kids would enjoy them too as they taste great and not so Super Organic.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey ATL

customer_reviews.title: So tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the white chocolate macadamia nut ones but oh so tasty even still. Much more filling than the natures valley pb granola bars. Will definitely buy again and certainly reccomend! They arent over poweringly peanut buttery either
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Peterson

customer_reviews.title: They were really good, awesome flavor (I don't think you can go ...
customer_reviews.text: These remind me of the Nature Valley bars. They were really good, awesome flavor (I don't think you can go wrong with peanut butter flavoring), and crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Mella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good and a great add on item for the extra subscribe and save, savings!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and convient. My husband takes them to eat on the way to work in the mornings when he works very early. Also, a good snack...
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Elliott

customer_reviews.title: bars are dry, which makes them crumbly
customer_reviews.text: It's probably the shipping that knocks em around. Since the bars are very dry, they crumbled and broke. When I opened the packages, some were still bars, albeit with tons of bits making a mess as they came out of the wrapper. Others were broken in multiple places. They taste ok, but aren't really bars by the time they made it to me.
customer_reviews.author: scipio

customer_reviews.title: Clif UGH and Yuck bars
customer_reviews.text: If you like ground up rough sawdust you'll like this Crunch bar. The texture can also be like what pressed wood particle board would taste like. Crunchy, dry and absent of any recognizable or worldly taste. I'm surprised Clif put its name on this junk. I love the Clif Energy bars, esp. Crunchy Peanut Butter, but this junk you should avoid. And, if you do try it I hope you have strong teeth or a good orthodontists. Good luck; I didn't know this when I bought buy now you do, hope it helped.
customer_reviews.author: A Dogged shopper

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Snack
customer_reviews.text: Way healthier then the competition and not as salty. This is my go to tasty snack.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best granola bars. Each packet contains two granola bars. I have them mid-morning and they satisfy me until lunch rolls around. If you love peanut butter you will love these.
customer_reviews.author: Kim from CA

customer_reviews.title: Better options
customer_reviews.text: I will not be buying these again. Nature valley and other alternatives taste better. I don't know if my box was stale or what but they a had a very slight chewiness to them, which I found really odd.
customer_reviews.author: airmanxx

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty delicious. Most of the clif products are great, with a few odd flavors as exceptions. Subscribe and save makes this a great deal. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mackhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good balance of protein and carbs
customer_reviews.text: Yum, yum in my tum, tum. Good balance of protein and carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Like the crunch better than the chewy regular cliff bars
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time finding in grocery store. Found on Amazon. Like the crunch better than the chewy regular cliff bars
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not only are the ingredients good for you
customer_reviews.text: These are so delicious! Not only are the ingredients good for you, but my kids got into my box and ate almost all of my bars. Clif is one of my favorite brands.
customer_reviews.author: E Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: ... these as a add in which made them a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to order these as a add in which made them a great price.
customer_reviews.author: EmJay

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is below average for a Cliff bar
customer_reviews.text: They were on sale because it must be a slow selling flavor. Not at all what I was expecting. Hard twin pack similar to a nature valley bar, not at all like most Cliff bars.
customer_reviews.author: zax031

customer_reviews.title: Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: As an avid cyclist, I have used Clif products for years. The larger, softer Clif Bars work well in my system as fuel for longer rides when eaten pre-ride. Sometimes you don't need that many calories, and these fit the bill nicely, and offer a different texture as well. As mentioned, this is a 10 bar box, and it is packaged 2 bars to the pouch, meaning you only get 5 pouches in the box. It is printed pretty plainly on the packaging, but just restating this in case you missed it somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Clark N.

customer_reviews.title: Good for diabetes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a diabetic, and like to keep snacks in my van. These are good to have on hand in my van when I need to keep my blood sugar up, if I'm having a low blood sugar time.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis 57

customer_reviews.title: Basically Nature Valley Granola Bar
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these, having been pleased with Clif products in the past. These, however, we almost identical to Nature Valley Granola bars, only there weren't as many, were more expensive, and didn't even taste as good.
customer_reviews.author: twinkletoes

customer_reviews.title: Very dry and crumbles.
customer_reviews.text: Very dry and crumbly. Hard to eat and really not even tasty. Would not buy again. I love other Clif products and eat them almost daily but this one is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Follz

customer_reviews.title: expensive cliff crunch bars
customer_reviews.text: These are not original cliff bars, but the smaller lower quality Cliff crunch bars. You can get these same bars in the same packaging at Walmart for 3 bucks for a box of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased good taste and my guys ate them quickly. Good product that is not so bad for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rainissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these were a really good price, and they taste really good too :o)
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Cunha

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: Great peanut butter flavor, nice crunch like the nature valley brand, but with organic ingredients so I feel better about buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: windhorse

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband's lunches. He loved them. Pleasantly surprised to find that the bars weren't completely crushed in shipping. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: BLP

customer_reviews.title: Too many carbs
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be a lot higher in carbs than I expected. I gave them away. The person to whom I gave them likes them very much. He is not on a diet!
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: OK, but too crunchy for me. Nice taste, but kept spilling more of than was actually eating. Guess will have to rethink this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: r2a2

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old loves these
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has these for a really good price, and I send them for lunch on a regular basis. Decent nutritional content, good taste, and much preferred to other granola bars.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were on sale but they weren't good enough to purchase at a retail price. Decent a lout of protein and nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Rose

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These weren't bad, just not as good as the other flavors but the price was right. They make a great pick me up on the trail or between meals.
customer_reviews.author: L. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Boring taste ....
customer_reviews.text: These didn't really do it for me, I love the blueberry, these are just kind of boring in taste. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Best Cherry Pie

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product several times. It is very tasty, light and crisp. I really like it and will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Way better than most other granola bars out there
customer_reviews.text: Been easting these for years. Way better than most other granola bars out there. Good taste and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Pham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good but small box. 5 packages with 2 in each package so no great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better then the soft clif bars, which most reviews I read about the soft ones say there is a worm issue?? ewww.
customer_reviews.author: Kaulgal

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: tastes good, provides medium lasting energy very quickly. price is decent, should be a little cheaper to compete with the grocery store
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just like Nature Valley Bars
customer_reviews.text: They taste and look exactly like Nature Valley Bars. Also note the 10-count box is 5 packages of 2 thin bars. I would rather get the Nature Valley--they're cheaper and taste the same.
customer_reviews.author: Starsy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Normally we love these, but this product was not fresh when I ordered via the monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable snack
customer_reviews.text: Not too sweet, and is a filling snack. I'm diabetic and I carry these for when my blood sugar gets too low.
customer_reviews.author: FRP

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Just like its taste. Not too sweet to me and don't feel thirsty afterwards. Always my first choice for outdoor sports.
customer_reviews.author: willing

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! And for the price, it was less than $0.10 per bar. A lot cheaper than your regular grocery or club member stores. Definitely will watch out for these awesome deals again!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but small amount
customer_reviews.text: Its kind of deceiving because they actually put 2 bars in each so you feel like you are only getting 5 bars, I didnt like that.
customer_reviews.author: RandR

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious and fulfilling
customer_reviews.text: These granola bars are so delicious and everyone in my home loved it. I will probably order more very soon!
customer_reviews.author: onoyuho

customer_reviews.title: ... different brands and flavors and this one is the best by far and even has real peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 different brands and flavors and this one is the best by far and even has real peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Product tastes good. But the description is a major issue. I thought based on wording. That I was to receive 10 bars total. There are only 5 packages with two thin bars in each sleeve. This is not a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Salcido

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these. Great taste, healthy, at a great price
customer_reviews.author: B21

customer_reviews.title: Cliff crunch bars
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever had a cliff crunch bar.... This is it. Exactly what you can buy anywhere else. That is all
customer_reviews.author: John Schwindt

customer_reviews.title: Crunch ...
customer_reviews.text: I was actually expecting soft and moist bar like all other kind but this was hard and dry and crunchy ... ha I guess I was not paying attention with the name CRUNCH when i order it. It tasted ok but not something I would want to order again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chen

customer_reviews.title: ... softer type bar but it was tasty and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a softer type bar but it was tasty and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Clif
customer_reviews.text: Best bars in the world- keep them in the car and at work. Perfect for an early breakfast or quick lunch!
customer_reviews.author: William E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: like i've said on the other 3 flavors i got..
customer_reviews.text: these are a great buy. Tasty. cheap. and not overly crunchy like nature valley granola bars. these ones are just right. as i said, great buy.. Even better snack!!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Better off eating dirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and hated them. They tasted like cardboard and that's being generous. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: rockland county, ny

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: i will do order again because my children like this Crunch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R. Hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Yumm
customer_reviews.text: I love these clif bars. They have a great none fake taste and I always love taking one of these with me when I'm in a hurry somewhere for a quick bite.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of peanut butter... And I should say that I liked this crunch bar. I would definitely get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Crunch peanut butter - tasty
customer_reviews.text: I find these to be tasty without being filling. I would prefer the mini-clif bars which have been out of stock. The mini- clifs are a better size and I like the texture for quick snacks and training fuel.
customer_reviews.author: M COLLIER

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: This product is the cheapest that I could find this item in any grocery store and I don't have to worry if it ever in stock. The convenience of getting this in the mail on a regular basis is great.
customer_reviews.author: S McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome treat
customer_reviews.text: These are so great and healthy for you and perfect for a snack and a late night treat. But the are so good for you also and the delivery was so quick and ahead of time :)
customer_reviews.author: Solomon Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: The Cliff Peanut Butter Crunch Bars were even better than expected! I'll be buying more again soon... my family had them all eaten before the week was over!
customer_reviews.author: jlove

customer_reviews.title: Yummy hard Clif bar
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the other Clif bars, but dry and crunchy. Tasty, portable, and cheaper than the others. Perfect snack.
customer_reviews.author: VerboseNerd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! More than meets my expectations. Flaky and delicious. I needed a snack under 200 cal, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This is a candy bar--Not a healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: When you open it up, it smells and tastes exactly like a nutter butter. It's not even filling. Not at all what i want when I'm in the mood for a healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Expectations
customer_reviews.text: We thought these would be the soft, chewy Clif bars, unfortunately it was not. It was the hard ones much like the nature bars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Tend to fall apart and end up ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Tend to fall apart and end up eat crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: these are not very good tasting, its essentially the same thing as nature valley bars, but more expensive than nature valley bars.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These things are a little messy, but they are so delicious it more than makes up for it. These are my favorite granola bars, and they are better for you than Quaker and other grocery store staples brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kwo

customer_reviews.title: These are run of the mill granola bars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a larger protein bar that would be sufficient for a meal replacement, not a scrawny granola bar that I could have bought for a third of the price. :( They tasted fine, but I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: DrewVT6

customer_reviews.title: Buy this at your local grocery.
customer_reviews.text: They taste good, but really aren't that healthy of a snack for you. Tons of sugar! These are good on the go and for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ariene Elmore

product_meta.title: CLIF CRUNCH - Granola Bar - Peanut Butter - 1.48 Ounce, 5 Two-Bar Pouches
product_meta.description: A granola bar made with organic ingredients and whole grains. Some adventures call for a lighter snack. With this in mind, we created CLIF CRUNCH(r)--a crunchy, delicious snack bar that provides you with energy, whatever the adventure.
feature_bullets: Creamy peanut butter chips plus whole grains, add a little crunch, and you've got an irresistibly wholesome snack.
Less than 200 calories per serving for a delicious on-the-go snack.
Crafted with Organic Rolled Oats and Organic Barley and Rye flakes, CLIF CRUNCH(r) is a good source of fiber (contains 9g total fat).
